title: Rapid e-Learning-Based Language Competency Enhancement Program for Global Sales Personnel

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business terminology and communication skills
context.additional_context: An intensive small-group training program combining VR simulations and e-learning to acquire practical language skills required in multicultural environments

learning_goals: Learners can use accurate business terminology considering cultural context with 90% accuracy when conversing with global clients.
Learners successfully perform real sales scenarios (negotiation, presentation, claim handling, etc.) in VR simulations with an 80% or higher success rate.
Learners apply communication strategies that improve language barriers by over 70% during collaboration with multinational team members.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
